main.titleH1: Finding new contacts in WhatsApp and Viber is easier than ever with QuickChat Search.
main.titleH2: Our service instantly redirects you to web pages of WhatsApp and Viber, using the specified phone number, providing instant access to the applications without unnecessary hassle.
main.text: No longer need to spend time searching and adding new contacts in your phone - QuickChat Search makes the whole process quick and convenient. Simply enter the number and enjoy instant communication!
main.patternMessage: Phone number must contain only digits
main.minLengthMessage: Number must be at least 10 characters long

feedback.title: This information will be displayed publicly, so please be careful about what you share.
feedback.name: Your name
